                                                          throws ConnectionErrorException

        Throws:
        ConnectionErrorException - As the connection is disconnected so calling receive will throw an exception

      • stateShouldBeErrorIfSendPacketThrowsException

                                                   throws ConnectionErrorException
        Tests that the connection's state is set to ERROR if when you call sendPacket, a ConnectionErrorException was thrown
        Throws:
        ConnectionErrorException - As the connection used will be disconnected so attempting to use it will throw an exception

      • receiveNextPacketShouldThrowExceptionIfStateError

        public void receiveNextPacketShouldThrowExceptionIfStateError()
                                                       throws ConnectionErrorException
        Tests that a ConnectionErrorException is thrown if the connection state is ERROR when receiveNextPacket is called
        Throws:
        ConnectionErrorException - As the connection will be in an error state so it is unuseable so will throw an exception

      • willReceiveBlockShouldThrowExceptionIfErrorState

        public void willReceiveBlockShouldThrowExceptionIfErrorState()
                                                      throws ConnectionErrorException
        Tests the connection to make sure that attempting to check if calling receive will block will throw an exception if the connection is in an error state
        Throws:
        ConnectionErrorException - As the connection is in an error state so it is not able to receive packets

      • willReceiveBlockShouldThrowExceptionifClosedState

        public void willReceiveBlockShouldThrowExceptionifClosedState()
                                                       throws ConnectionErrorException
        Tests the connection to make sure that attempting to check if calling receive will block will throw an exception if the connection is in an error state
        Throws:
        ConnectionErrorException - As the connection is in a closed state so will not be able to receive packets
